pr_title: [568312] Project preferences and export no longer works

timeline.message:
[568312] Project preferences no longer work properly

We were setting default preference store on fields and a second time
with the properties page one.

We still save Preferences in .settings and in
IProject.persistentProperty, even if it seems useless. I have remove
pageId field as we don't use it when we read IProject.persistentProperty
properties

Bug: 568312
Change-Id: I5507178e9fb40faa1ed24d0d665db26c4c70051a

timeline.bodyText: moved to parent class handling UserMode, ConfigurableFieldEditorPreferencePage
timeline.author: pdulth

timeline.bodyText: useless and risky super.getPreferenceStore call doGetPreferenceStore
timeline.author: pdulth

timeline.bodyText: useless, we already save preference store
timeline.author: pdulth

timeline.bodyText:
never occurs.
this method is called at startup.
even if there is projects in workspace, there is no "getPropertyPreferenceStore" as it is only created when user click on Project/Properties
timeline.author: pdulth
pdulth

timeline.bodyText: pageId is useless and make code unclear, we don't use it afterwards in ScopedCapellaProjectScope.getProjectValue
timeline.author: pdulth
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -172,18 +149,22 @@ private void writeProperties(ProjectScope project) throws IOException {
 
   /**
    * Convenience method to set a property
-   * @param name - the preference name
-   * @param value - the property value or null to delete the property
+   * 
+   * @param name
+   *          - the preference name
+   * @param value
+   *          - the property value or null to delete the property
    * @throws CoreException
    */
   private void setProperty(String name, String value) throws CoreException {
-    resource.setPersistentProperty(new QualifiedName(pageId, name), value);

Bug: 568312
Change-Id: I5507178e9fb40faa1ed24d0d665db26c4c70051a

[568312] Fix Export of Preferences

- There was many classes for the export and most were unused
- At export of preferences, (from File > Export > Preferences and
Windows > Preferences > Export) with an event sent to IEventBroker, we
export InstanceScope preferences, but we ensure that all default values
are set in it before export

timeline.bodyText: Yes, I agree that it's strange to save project preferences using both ProjectScope (saved in project .settings) and IProject.getPersistentProperty (saved in the workspace with the path to the project). But it was like this before, so I think we could keep the same code.
timeline.author: minhtutonthat
